fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Choose a player, and redirect all their visitors to yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If someone uses any ability on your whatsoever that actually gets processed, you and everybody who visits you will die immediately.
- Anybody who visits you or your ability's target will be warned on the spot that they targeted a Nuclear Warhead. As long as the night isn't over, they'll be able to switch targets.
- You can also switch your target at any point in the night. Nobody will be notified that you did this unless they target your new target after you switch.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get someone to target you in the night and detonate.
